attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As reported in the papers over the weekend, council's are giving themselves powers to gain entry into your property and fine you £1000 and £200 per day for failing to allow them access to your property. This has to stop as it will affect everyone and it will come to a time when no one can afford to live. We pay enough tax on wages as it is so why should we pay even more when we see no returns for the money that we pump into this country

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
